website_summaries.verdict: Affordable option if you're in search of an everyday thong, namely one that washes well.
pros: Elastic lace band means no more cutting into your sides or muffin tops
Sizing and conversion chart are accurate, so it's easy to find a pair that fits the right way
Comparable to high-end department store pairs
cons: Threads and elastic in the lace band can come loose
Has a tag, which can be challenging to remove without damaging the pair

customer_reviews.title: Holy crap! You really can't feel these!
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap, these really are amazing! I've never worn thongs before, because why would I want to walk around with a perpetual wedgie? I thought that people who say that you shouldn't feel like you're wearing anything if you're wearing the right thong have just gotten so used to them, but YOU CANNOT FEEL THESE. I've tried a couple other brands with good reviews, but they gave me that perpetual wedgie feeling. I'm blown away and am a convert. I'm getting more!!
customer_reviews.author: Bea Paris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect underwear
customer_reviews.text: Perfect underwear! Let me start by saying, I hate the feeling most thongs offer. For the first time ever, I have found a pair that are beyond awesome. I hate panty lines under my work out clothes but these panties are not only super comfortable but do not show through. I also wear uniforms and they work great for that as well! I will surely buy more. For those trying to figure out the sizing, I am 5'9" and 148 pounds with a long torso and the small/medium fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Flower Power

customer_reviews.title: Love these! I wear a 7 in underwear and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I wear a 7 in underwear and 10 or 12 in pants, these thongs are so soft and nice and stretchy you don't notice them. I have about 4 or 5 different colors and i have to say my biggest complaint is that the navy blue pairs i just ordered are not as stretchy and are cut smaller in the front. Not by much but enough that some touch up shaving could be in order, and i pick other colors to wear first.
customer_reviews.author: Miodd

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect amount of coverage and attractive feel. Flattering even on a curvy figure. A nice give and stretch without awkward bunching or rolling up. The sizing is a little strange but does match the chart. I normally wear a medium but in this I was XL (not good for the ego) but they are nice enough in the smoothness, attractiveness and fit, I think I will include them in my usual panty regiment. For reference my sizing is 31-waist, 37.5-hips.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Invisible, comfortable and don't cause a muffin top
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear under a form-fitting wedding dress and they're perfect. I was hesitant about the one-size-fits-all thing but they fit pretty well. Slightly big but they'll do the trick. They're seamless and invisible under clothing, the material is smooth and comfortable and the waistband is perfect (no side flab or digging in). I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: ColleenG

customer_reviews.title: On the large side.
customer_reviews.text: Hoping to find an alternative to Hanky Panky cuz they're so spendy. But these just don't have the same fit as the reliable Hanky Panky. These are somewhat loose and I feel that I have to keep adjusting them. Maidenform should really have these in separate sizes instead of combo sizes like small/medium. I'm just not a medium fit and need a definite small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are so incredibly comfortable and just what I wanted for sleeping in at ...
customer_reviews.text: These are so incredibly comfortable and just what I wanted for sleeping in at night. I ordered size large... I am 5'4" and 130lbs, but I have a booty that most often requires large size parties for a comfortable fit.... so these fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie B.

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a somewhat cheaper replacement to hanky panky's original rise thong because they were falling apart pretty quickly, and this definitely is it! I find I poke holes quickly in lace thongs, and with the soft cotton portion on these, they should last much longer. They are incredibly comfortable, the rise makes me feel "tucked in" in places where I need tucking, and the lace band makes them invisible under clothes. Im normally a size 8, and I went with the L/XL so nothing would squeeze. A win!
customer_reviews.author: Rlath727

customer_reviews.title: Not very happy..
customer_reviews.text: I wore both pair, obviously on two different dates...and one of the stretchy "thread"s came loose...and I tried to cut the strings off VERY carefully...but. both of them have missing stretchy threads...I thought that purchasing Maidenform, that I would get quality items...I was wrong...unfortunately...I obviously cannot return them....I guess I'm just out of luck...I would NOT recommend these lace panties...
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: One size fits all fits me
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the most comfortable underwear I've ever purchased. I ordered in every color once I tried my first pair. I wear a size 0 / 25 in jeans, but these would stretch much larger if needed. The price is right too!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Okay Underwear Nothing Special
customer_reviews.text: They are fairly cheap underwear in my opinion. They just feel cheaply made with very thin material. It’s slightly to big that I can pull them up a little too much. I probably wouldn’t buy this again but if you need some quick undies for a trip or something this will work. They are comfortable though.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing from Maidenform
customer_reviews.text: A terrible choice for me....I've been wearing things for several years and they seem more difficult to find substantially made ones. This, to be honest, was a complete waste of money...no shape, doesn't stay in place, altogether pretty awful. Lesson learned...the two I purchased will be throw aways.
customer_reviews.author: Teagen

customer_reviews.title: they are super comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be a little bit uncomfortable for a thong bc they seemed to have a lot of fabric (again, for a thong). But they are not at all. In fact, they are super comfortable and cute.
customer_reviews.author: ACPomma

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement???
customer_reviews.text: These are not the lace underwear you advertised. They’re very comfy, but they’re not what I was told I was buying. I was going to return them, but decided not to because they fit perfectly. But they’re not the lace maidenform one size fits all thongs I always bought at kohl’s. Id love to buy more actually, but the price was jacked WAY UP!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fray

customer_reviews.title: Comfy panties!
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying these for about 3 years now and love them (although the price keeps going up). Super comfortable and they fit great despite being one-size-fits-all. I'm an active size 2 gal and will continue to wear them. I machine wash them but hang them to dry.
customer_reviews.author: E Evans

customer_reviews.title: Thong is great but arrived with small hole in material
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy material. Easily one of the comfiest things I've worn. The material is very soft, but very thin so I imagine it wont last long. Absolutely great for the price though. I would give 5 stars if it hadn't arrived with that rip.
customer_reviews.author: J-Moe

customer_reviews.title: Nice overall - big difference between sizes see images :)
customer_reviews.text: Lace is fine not rough, microfiber thong but gusset is cotton, big difference between am/Med and large 2 - 2 1/2 inches difference in waiste band lace see images :)
customer_reviews.author: DParker

customer_reviews.title: Now Chica Wow Wow
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a present to myself (err umm, my wife I mean). lol. Very good quality and extremely sexy. Got my mojo going. The only thing is that they are cut a little small, so I would recommend going one size up.
customer_reviews.author: teburns81

customer_reviews.title: Way too big
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size small/medium as it's the smallest size available. It fits like a large. I never have much problems with underwear, I'm 115 pounds average hips and they are swimming on me. Very cheaply made as well, already cut off 4 lose strings. Already worn so I can't return but disappointed as it's exactly the style I was looking for but they are huge. I am also not used to spending nearly $10 on one pair of underwear, so I was expecting some kind of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Cute and comfy! Only problem I have is that the elastic in the waistband feels very weak, and I feel like these might slide off easily. For the price though, it's to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: yeehaw cowboy

customer_reviews.title: Super soft...
customer_reviews.text: This thong is so comfortable. I wish a lot of undergarments were this comfortable. Heck, I wish all garments were this comfortable. I also found this to be the perfect thong to wear when I had a bit of a shaving burn--the fabric is so soft it did not irritate the skin further. There is literally nothing I have as a con to buying this, other than to warn you that you may have the urge to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Tosh

customer_reviews.title: Best Thong Ever- Comfortable and Sexy
customer_reviews.text: My search for a comfortable, yet sexy thong is over! I have tried more brands than I care to mention- trying to find a thong that fit my wide hips without rolling after the first few minutes of wear and felt comfortable for day wear, all while not scratching my cooch. This one is it! Your search ends here, ladies...
customer_reviews.author: HDCass

customer_reviews.title: Crotch area a bit big, but cute and comftorable
customer_reviews.text: My pair a good two to 3 days early, I ordered the small/medium in navy and it looks lovely. Only negative thing is the crotch area is a bit big so the area has a few folds or a bit of a baggy look but it is not a huge nuisance to me. They also ride high on me so definitly would not wear with low rise pants or anything without a belt or high waist as they peek out when I bend over and squat.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Soft and stretchy
customer_reviews.text: Very stretchy but fit well. Very soft and comfy cotton like material. For lounging, not for working out.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. Good quality Maidenform product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Good quality Maidenform product, has held up after months of wear/washes. The lace waist make them fit perfectly around the waist. I would order these over a similar Victoria's Secret product (that I have ordered in the past).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... still stay in place and the XL size has better coverage up front
customer_reviews.text: I'm a guy and these fit a little big around the waist but still stay in place and the XL size has better coverage up front. Waist size 34. The smaller size fits waist better just a little less coverage but still acceptable. Very comfortable and wife likes them on me too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: Most comfy thong I have ever worn! Nice stretchy material! I am 5'6", and 143lbs, and it fit perfectly! Silky smooth! Only thing I don't love is the tag...You have to tuck it in, but it doesn't irritate.
customer_reviews.author: mamato5boysand?

customer_reviews.title: Better than Victoria’s Secret and Nordstrom underwear
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than Victoria’s Secret, Nordstrom’s Hanky Panky, or any other brand I have ever bought. Hands down. They are buttery soft with a flex fit where I feel like they form to my body. They wash beautifully by keeping that soft feel and are so comfortable! Highly highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cori

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but I dont love it
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty underware but the fabric gets relax too quickly ... and it bends ... I will come back to cotton
customer_reviews.author: Paola

customer_reviews.title: Favorite undies!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered the all lace thong and have had them for two years now. They are still soft and fit perfectly, so that is why I decided to order these. Shipped on time and fit just as well as the ones I bought two years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Tabbatha

customer_reviews.title: and it feels like they are cheap
customer_reviews.text: These were not at all as I expected. They asked to specify a size, but when they arrived, they were "one size fits all". Although they fit around the waist, the rise is very short. The material is a cheap material, and it feels like they are cheap, not at all what I would expect from Maidenform. So disappointing. Do NOT buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B. Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Really cute.
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute! They fit great and they look really great.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Love The Stretchy Lace
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter as she likes this style and color. Was a bit of guess work on size as she has a nice "booty," but large is often too big. So chose medium. Fit perfectly. Nice nylon and lace material and the red is as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lusk

customer_reviews.title: Nice! I recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice! I am not a thong person and yet managed to wear these all day without being uncomfortable. They do not ride up or stretch out. Very pleased as I needed something that wouldn't show lines.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Love these Panties.
customer_reviews.text: Love these panties. Deal with the panty-line problem without the discomfort experienced from most other thongs. And they look great and launder well.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Les Fouris

customer_reviews.title: Tried these instead of my typical Hanky Pankys to save ...
customer_reviews.text: Tried these instead of my typical Hanky Pankys to save money and ended up wasting money. These are awful in comparison to Hanky Pankys, are cut awkwardly, and make cheaply.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy

customer_reviews.title: They were very comfortable and I hardly knew they were there
customer_reviews.text: I used the panties under my lacey wedding dress and they worked perfectly. They were very comfortable and I hardly knew they were there. They didn't leave the "pantie line" that I hate oh-so-much. I still use them now as regular, daily undies and they work well for that, too! The fit was great, too. All around good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Rogerson

customer_reviews.title: Great low rise thong for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot. I bought many hanky panky low rise thongs based on many rave reviews. But these are cheaper.and just as nice if not nicer. Also hanky panky are one size fits all - and they are on the small size. These come in two sizes. T get the large. I am 5' 6" and weigh about 130. I find these larges more comfy than the hanky pankys - although they aren't quite as low rise. But hey - isn't that whole low rise thing passé now anyway?!!
customer_reviews.author: JHT

customer_reviews.title: Best thongs I own
customer_reviews.text: I'm about to order more of these - These are the best pair of thongs that I own. They do not roll or sag, and they come up pretty high on my waist which is great for pencil skirts. The material is also very silky, yet high quality/thick.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sapienza

customer_reviews.title: Nice fabric and happy that there is a cotton crotch
customer_reviews.text: Nice fabric and happy that there is a cotton crotch. Disappointed at the fit I am 5' 8" 140 lbs and they are a bit too big. Also the tag created a hole.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, the lace is super comfortable for all-day wear.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, sexy, roomy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable around the waist. Material or lace does not bother at all. This is my third time purchasing these because they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Max Rathgeber

customer_reviews.title: Good, especially if you're not a thong wearer.
customer_reviews.text: Super soft, although when I had it on I felt like it might fall off but it felt very comfortable and stayed in place. Also did not cause discomfort, would recommend. Especially if you're not use to wearing thongs.
customer_reviews.author: Wuilber Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Was worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Very stretchable but very nice and comfortable. Not cheaply made to where it will fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Munchnplay

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent. I'm not a thong person
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent. I'm not a thong person, but this is comfortable when I need one. I'm fairly slim though (size 4), and this is a bit looser than I would have liked. It gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: and they're really comfortable. These are my favorite ever
customer_reviews.text: The lace holds up really well after many washes, and they're really comfortable. These are my favorite ever.
customer_reviews.author: Alex525Alex

customer_reviews.title: Just get it.
customer_reviews.text: Just get this. What more, best prices than the expensive VS yet fits exactly and looks even better. Wise to spend less for more is all I can say. Yet I ordered 2 VS pants for $16 each, now wish I didn't and I cannot rent because I live abroad.
customer_reviews.author: chinedu

customer_reviews.title: I love this cut/fit of thongs
customer_reviews.text: I love this cut/fit of thongs. Very comfortable when I thought I would never wear thongs. The choice in sizing was S/M or L/XL. I am 5'7" and weigh 135lbs. I took a gamble and got the L/XL because I didn't want to go to small. I should have chosen the S/M. They are too big but not too big that I can't wear.
customer_reviews.author: R. Star

customer_reviews.title: Wife was happy, fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: Two thumbs up from wife! So you get a review lol!
customer_reviews.author: Chris W.

customer_reviews.title: These area great deal and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These area great deal and very comfortable. They are synthetic but don't feel too nylon or clingy and seem to wear well. Very good value and seem to last better than others i have previously purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Siobhan Fryatt

customer_reviews.title: Look Good and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of pairs of this underwear and I really like them, so I bought another. These fit well and are comfortable. I like the wider hip bands. They are flattering.
customer_reviews.author: DutchGrrl

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute and nice feel but it's baggy like a size too large
customer_reviews.author: Zoey

customer_reviews.title: Like wearing a cloud :-)
customer_reviews.text: Loved Loved Loved how these fit. It's as if I hadn't put them on! No riding up into uncomfortable places, no feeling strangled around my hips! At least for me - these were like wearing clouds! ok, maybe I'm taking this too far, but I will be ordering more now that the test has passed with flying colors.
customer_reviews.author: Tulsi17

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and gets the job done. Not the highest quality
customer_reviews.text: The color was just as pictured. They are nice and pretty. They aren't the highest quality, but truth be told I didn't buy these to be worn all day. They get the job done if you catch my meaning. They also fit as expected. I am a plus sized gal who is a size 18. The Large/X-large fit just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great panty!
customer_reviews.text: So happy to find these! And at $2 less each than Kohl's! I used to wear Fredricks of Hollywood ones, but with them closing all their stores and not having much online, I needed to find something. These fit great and are comfortable! So glad I found them!
customer_reviews.author: NThomas

customer_reviews.title: Pretty.
customer_reviews.text: I got these to "try" the look out. Find out I still need to lose more weight. Hoping that they will fit me better when I do. I ordered a L thinking it might work. No, so maybe in ten pounds..... Seem good quality (I am new to thongs!!!)
customer_reviews.author: AngloAustrian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Panties!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these panties so much I bought several more! I ordered a Large. They are true to size and fit comfortably with no muffin top. They are also very cute. And cotton. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa L. Ingram

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the Maidenform panties. Great material, great fit & just the right amount of sex appeal! ;-) haha
customer_reviews.author: Chantille B.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion these are the best pair of thongs I've ever owned... the comfort by far exceeds expectations. Doesnt even feel like your weraing anything, I will be buying more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Pogue

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: I am BWH 39-33-40 and normal BMI, and the Large/X-Large fits in the sense that I can slip it on. But, I am not really satisfied as it has absolutely no grip as it has no elastic tension. OK, so that means that it does not bind nor leave marks nor panty lines, but it also means that it can move out of position very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: runs big - very stretchy.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, but it runs too big! For reference, I ordered size small, and weigh, 119 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: cinnamon_girl_hawaii

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed Maidenform has limited sizes to just S/M and L/XL
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed Maidenform has limited sizes to just S/M and L/XL, I'm a size 7 or Large and these fit way too big. The S/M fit way too small.
customer_reviews.author: Genie

customer_reviews.title: Quality & cute
customer_reviews.text: Low rise, comfy and completely true to size. Maiden form is one of my "go to" panty brands. And I only have 3 fave panty brands!
customer_reviews.author: CCL

customer_reviews.title: way better than hanky panky
customer_reviews.text: Hanky Panky panties have met their match. These are perfect. Pros: - wash well and very durable - no panty line - fit better than hanky panky b/c of size options - much better price than hanky panky cons: - none
customer_reviews.author: JPeacock

customer_reviews.title: Stay put!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, sexy, and they stay in place. Many of my lace panties tend to roll depending upon what garment I'm wearing over the top. These lay flat and stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable. I'm kind of bootylicious so I was pleasantly surprised that these fit so well
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: The pattern looks...odd
customer_reviews.text: At a glance it looks like you're not wearing underwear but that you have an...interesting style of pubic hair. I love them anyway, but it's kind of disconcerting if you change in a locker rooms, etc. very often.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'5" 145lbs and a medium is good. I also like the lace waist band. It does not dig in and provides a smooth look. I do wish they offer these is a cotton.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: but this one is amazing. Great fit and lots of colors
customer_reviews.text: I have never worn a thong because I thought it would be uncomfortable, but this one is amazing. Great fit and lots of colors.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy, super sexy.
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, very sexy, very comfy, very soft, and very... effective. I'll be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: CynBio

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a male. I tried these out and I was completely surprised. These are super comfortable and they are rather flattering! I would definitely recommend these! I’m going to get more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly comfortable (once you cut the tag off)
customer_reviews.text: The only underwear I wear! Incredibly comfortable (once you cut the tag off).
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Great Thong!
customer_reviews.text: Great price compared to the department stores. What little fabric there is seems to be sewn well. It's comfortable, both in fit and the feel of the fabric. Would definitely recommend and will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good panties
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this style panty from Maidenform for many years. They have changed a bit over the years, but still fit beautifully and are well constructed and the price is still very fair.
customer_reviews.author: kat erickson

customer_reviews.title: ... the bigger end of "small" & the fit is comfortable. I love how silky the material is
customer_reviews.text: I'm on the bigger end of "small" & the fit is comfortable. I love how silky the material is, and I appreciate that the front isn't lace.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the material. I prefer microfiber and similar better than cotton. Comfortable fit and snug as described.
customer_reviews.author: Cathaoir

customer_reviews.title: Runs large.
customer_reviews.text: The underwear looked fine, but the S/M was huge. I am 5'1" ~105# and it didn't come close to fitting.
customer_reviews.author: B. Inmn

customer_reviews.title: Never knew "saggy crotch" was a thing until I bought 8 pairs of these monstrosities
customer_reviews.text: I really, really wanted to love these. I wanted an alternative to hanky pankys because I hate spending $20/pair. However, if you are at all on the small side, these will not fit. I have an athletic body, with a proportionally large booty, and I wear a 4/6 in clothing. I bought 8 pairs of these in a small and all of them are way, way too big. There's some "sagging" in the crotch which is anything but flattering, they're far too high waisted (think peeking out of all of your high waisted jeans) and the waist band is just too big. When I wear these, all I can think about is my saggy crotch. WHAT a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: They also go up pretty high. Like a little higher than I expected ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered SM/MD and it seems a little tad bit loose. They also go up pretty high. Like a little higher than I expected or shown in the picture, but it's alright I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Shaina Parkinson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it - comfy and cute, what more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: ACPomma

customer_reviews.title: sexy thong
customer_reviews.text: ok ive seen the reviews but i dont see one thing wrong with these ,there very nice and look fabulous on ,i wish i had of ordered a few more!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Randie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these panties! They fit perfect and are so comfortable! I want them in every color!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie D

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly and is comfortable. I immediately ordered another after wearing it for ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly and is comfortable. I immediately ordered another after wearing it for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: ... however its slightly bigger and looser than i would like and looser than my other maidenform thongs but i ...
customer_reviews.text: got my usual size in maidenform sizes however its slightly bigger and looser than i would like and looser than my other maidenform thongs but i love the material super soft. the lace isnt itchy. the significant other loves it too!
customer_reviews.author: Nadine

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable & luxurious
customer_reviews.text: So nice to have underwear that fits. One size fits all does not work for me! And the fabric is silky smooth. Well made and sexy
customer_reviews.author: KarenB

customer_reviews.title: No muffin Top!
customer_reviews.text: No muffin top! Very comfortable, been through many washes and still as new.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne D

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I purchased to match this bra  Will order more.
customer_reviews.author: M/M Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought for fiancee as a surprise gift with a few other pairs. The raspberry sorbet is a very striking color and we both agree they look very attractive. Will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: I want them all!
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite underwear, I bought 5 of them so far and counting. They are so comfy, cute, and sexy! They also hold up well in the washing machine and dryer!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly!

customer_reviews.title: all around satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, sexy, arrived in a timely manner, all around satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Brierton

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these! So comfy! I have more on the way
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Love these, so glad I found them
customer_reviews.text: Love these, so glad I found them. They are very similar to the Felina one size fits all thong that they sell in a three pack except these are not all cotton...I like them anyway and they are a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: don't work for small
customer_reviews.text: They are cute and comfortable but one size fits all is not a good idea I think. I wear small in this style of panties and these were too big for me.
customer_reviews.author: GetaN

customer_reviews.title: but the fabric is very thin and I don't feel comfortable in it
customer_reviews.text: It fits all sizes, indeed, but the fabric is very thin and I don't feel comfortable in it.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenchen

customer_reviews.title: These are so comfortable and the fabric seems like it will hold up ...
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable and the fabric seems like it will hold up much better than most Lacey thongs. I will definitely be purchasing more!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elle l.

customer_reviews.title: Great underoos!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I bought about 8 different colors. They fit so well and are perfect for tight fitting clothing and don't show any lines.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit!! I have them in almost every color!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly comfortable. Wonderful quality material. Great for working out, running, under jeans, anything. Will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: CMoo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wife says they feel great... They look great on her too!

customer_reviews.text: a little large for me but it is nice and comfortable

product_meta.title: Maidenform Womens Dream Lace Thong Panty
product_meta.description:
Dream in the comfort of this silky soft panty. Features a microfiber body with stretch lace along the top.

Dream in the comfort of this silky soft panty. Features a microfiber body with stretch lace along the top.
feature_bullets: Front And Back Panel: 87% Polyamide, 13% Elastane; Lace: 90% Polyamide, 10% Elastane; Crotch Lining: 100% Cotton
Covered elastic leg opening for a custom fit
